item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 29, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:

9. Visualize and debug Rust programs with a new lens (114 points | 16 comments)

11. What does “Undecidable” mean, anyway (71 points | 68 comments)

26. YAD: display graphical dialogs from shell scripts or command line (26 points | 2 comments)
